tool.name: Generate overview information
tool.help:
This tool generates an overview of the flow analysis results.
-----
**Input**
This tool can read in the summary table from a CrossSample run (a tab-separated file containing the counts of events in each population in each file that was run through CrossSample)
**Output**
The output is a page that allows visualization of the data.
-----
**Example**
*Input*::
Filename Placeholder_sampleName Pop1 Pop2 Pop3 ... File1 Biosample1 255 147 18 ... File2 Biosample2 27 61 965 ... File3 Biosample3 201 546 221 ... File4 Biosample4 11 77 327 ...
*Output*
Stacked Area Plot:
.. image:: ../../static/images/flowtools/summary.png
Stacked Bar Plot:
.. image:: ../../static/images/flowtools/overview.png
Parallel Coordinate:
.. image:: ../../static/images/flowtools/scatter2D.png
